emails.subject: RE: DNEXT Api Documentation
emails.body_text:
Hello Lincoln,

 

Just following up to check if everything is well on your end concerning the API & the Excel Add-in

 

Please let me know if you are encountering any difficulties or issues.

 

Looking forward to hearing back from you

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Saber Khalfallah 
Sent: Thursday, October 16, 2025 0:49
To: Lincoln Herrington <lherrington@massarcapital.com>; G Ciancio <gciancio@massarcapital.com>
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: DNEXT Api Documentation

 

Hello Lincoln

 

We are glad to inform you that the issue has been resolved.

 

We thank you for your patience and appreciate your understanding while we worked fixing the bug.

 

Kindly find attached a PDF containing the documentation for the DNext excel add-in

 

If you have any questions or if you need any assistance please do not hesitate to reach out.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
